doc.field: ! ! config contributed by /u/nzxtquad on reddit ! ! service unsupported-transceiver hostname IOS-XR clock timezone Nederland 1 clock summer-time Nederland recurring last sunday march 02:00 last sunday october 03:00 banner motd ^C |-----------------------------------------------------------------| | This system is for the use of authorized users only. | | Individuals using this computer system without authority, or in | | excess of their authority, are subject to having all of their | | activities on this system monitored and recorded by system | | personnel. | | | | In the course of monitoring individuals improperly using this | | system, or in the course of system maintenance, the activities | | of authorized users may also be monitored. | | | | Anyone using this system expressly consents to such monitoring | | and is advised that if such monitoring reveals possible | | evidence of criminal activity, system personnel may provide the | | evidence of such monitoring to law enforcement officials. | |-----------------------------------------------------------------| ^C logging trap debugging logging archive device harddisk severity debugging file-size 10 frequency daily archive-size 300 archive-length 4 ! logging console disable logging monitor debugging logging buffered 307200 logging buffered debugging logging facility local4 logging 10.10.10.10 vrf default severity info logging 10.10.10.11 vrf default severity info logging source-interface Loopback1 service timestamps log datetime localtime msec show-timezone service timestamps debug datetime localtime msec show-timezone logging events link-status software-interfaces telnet vrf default ipv4 server max-servers 4 username test123 group root-system secret 5 test123 ! aaa authentication login default local cdp configuration commit auto-save filename vrf test123 address-family ipv4 unicast import route-target 65031:630 ! export route-target 65031:630 ! ! ! tcp selective-ack tcp path-mtu-discovery line console exec-timeout 30 0 length 0 ! line default exec-timeout 10 0 access-class ingress test-ACL transport input all ! snmp-server ifindex persist snmp-server trap link ietf snmp-server user monitoring monitoring v3 auth md5 encrypted 11302B5515413F0E233D2836311C132D test-ACL SystemOwner snmp-server view novacm internet included snmp-server view monitoring 1 included snmp-server group monitoring v3 auth read monitoring snmp-server traps bfd snmp-server traps ntp snmp-server traps copy-complete snmp-server traps snmp snmp-server traps snmp linkup snmp-server traps snmp linkdown snmp-server traps snmp coldstart snmp-server traps snmp warmstart snmp-server traps snmp authentication snmp-server traps flash removal snmp-server traps flash insertion snmp-server traps config snmp-server traps entity snmp-server traps syslog snmp-server traps system snmp-server traps bridgemib snmp-server chassis-id IOS-XR snmp-server contact Glasoperator NOC info@glasoperator.nl snmp-server location Alphen VVS snmp-server trap-source BVI600 monitor-session SpanToSniffer ethernet destination pseudowire ! monitor-session NBIP-tap-to-asd-tc4 ethernet destination pseudowire ! dhcp ipv4 profile cpe-mgt relay helper-address vrf default 10.12.0.2 relay information option allow-untrusted ! profile ACC-iptv relay helper-address vrf default 10.12.252.19 relay information option allow-untrusted ! profile ODF-iptv relay helper-address vrf default 10.12.255.39 relay information option allow-untrusted ! profile nws-iptv relay helper-address vrf default 10.12.13.2 relay information option allow-untrusted ! profile cpe-mgt-new relay helper-address vrf default 10.10.68.25 relay information option allow-untrusted ! profile wisper-internet relay helper-address vrf default 10.10.100.10 helper-address vrf default 10.10.100.11 relay information option allow-untrusted ! interface BVI200 relay profile internet interface Bundle-Ether1.111 relay profile cpe-mgt-new interface Bundle-Ether1.611 relay profile ODF-iptv interface Bundle-Ether2.111 relay profile cpe-mgt-new interface Bundle-Ether2.611 relay profile ODF-iptv interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.111 relay profile cpe-mgt-new interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.110 relay profile cpe-mgt-new interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.611 relay profile ODF-iptv duplicate-mac-allowed ! control-plane management-plane inband interface BVI600 allow SSH allow SNMP allow Telnet ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 allow SSH allow SNMP allow Telnet ! interface TenGigE0/1/0/0 allow SSH allow SNMP allow Telnet ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2002 allow SSH allow SNMP allow Telnet ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2003 allow SSH allow SNMP allow Telnet ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2005 allow SSH allow SNMP allow Telnet ! ! out-of-band interface MgmtEth0/RSP0/CPU0/1 allow Telnet ! ! ! ! ipv4 access-list acl-bfd 10 remark ********* Used for matching bfd traffic ********* 20 permit udp any any eq 3785 30 permit udp any any eq 3784 40 permit udp any any eq 4784 50 permit tcp any any eq 3785 60 permit tcp any any eq 3784 70 permit tcp any any eq 4784 ! class-map match-any test123 match dscp ipv4 af41 end-class-map ! interface Bundle-Ether1 description *** To test456 *** mtu 9000 mac-address e.0.1 load-interval 30 dampening ! interface Bundle-Ether1.100 description *** test456 *** mtu 1518 service-policy input critical-data-marker ipv4 address 10.10.50.60 255.255.254.0 ipv4 verify unicast source reachable-via rx arp timeout 3600 ipv4 unreachables disable encapsulation dot1q 100 ipv4 access-group filter-managment-cpe-ingress ingress ipv4 access-group filter-managment-cpe-egress egress ! interface Loopback0 description *** Router-id for routing processes *** ipv4 address 10.0.0.1 255.255.255.255 ! interface Loopback1 description *** Management loopback *** ipv4 address 10.1.2.3 255.255.255.255 ! interface MgmtEth0/RSP0/CPU0/0 shutdown ! interface MgmtEth0/RSP0/CPU0/1 shutdown ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 description *** To router2 (Te 0/1/0/3) *** mtu 9000 service-policy output egress-core ipv4 address 10.12.3.4 255.255.255.252 carrier-delay up 5000 down 0 load-interval 30 dampening ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1 description *** To router3 (Te 1/7) *** mtu 9000 carrier-delay up 5000 down 0 mac-address e.0.8 load-interval 30 dampening ! interface BVI200 description *** Wisper Internet aggregatie interface *** ipv4 address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.128 ipv4 verify unicast source reachable-via rx arp timeout 3600 local-proxy-arp ipv4 unreachables disable mac-address e.0.1 load-interval 30 ! interface BVI611 description *** TEST *** ipv4 address 10.2.3.4 255.255.255.0 ipv4 verify unicast source reachable-via rx arp timeout 3600 ipv4 unreachables disable mac-address e.0.8 ! route-policy pass-all pass end-policy ! router isis test is-type level-1 net 47.0012.0000.0000.1111.00 nsf ietf log adjacency changes lsp-gen-interval maximum-wait 5000 initial-wait 1 secondary-wait 50 level 1 address-family ipv4 unicast metric-style wide ispf level 1 spf-interval maximum-wait 1000 initial-wait 1 secondary-wait 50 ! interface Bundle-Ether1.111 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! ! interface Bundle-Ether1.611 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! ! interface Bundle-Ether2.211 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! ! interface Bundle-Ether2.611 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! ! interface Loopback0 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 circuit-type level-1 bfd minimum-interval 50 bfd multiplier 3 bfd fast-detect ipv4 point-to-point address-family ipv4 unicast metric 10 mpls ldp sync ! ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.100 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.110 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.611 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! ! router bgp 65164 nsr bgp router-id 10.12.34.56 bgp graceful-restart graceful-reset bgp graceful-restart bgp log neighbor changes detail bgp bestpath med always bgp fast-external-fallover disable address-family ipv4 unicast redistribute connected ! address-family vpnv4 unicast ! address-family ipv6 unicast redistribute connected allocate-label all ! address-family ipv4 mdt ! neighbor 10.12.34.57 remote-as 65164 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 bfd minimum-interval 50 update-source Loopback0 graceful-restart address-family ipv4 unicast maximum-prefix 700000 90 ! address-family vpnv4 unicast ! address-family ipv6 labeled-unicast maximum-prefix 100000 75 ! address-family ipv4 mdt ! ! neighbor 10.12.34.58 remote-as 50266 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 bfd minimum-interval 50 update-source Loopback0 graceful-restart address-family ipv4 unicast maximum-prefix 700000 90 ! address-family vpnv4 unicast ! address-family ipv6 labeled-unicast maximum-prefix 100000 75 ! address-family ipv4 mdt ! ! ! l2vpn load-balancing flow src-dst-ip pw-class test789 encapsulation mpls transport-mode ethernet load-balancing pw-label ! ! ! xconnect group span p2p span monitor-session SpanToSniffer neighbor ipv4 10.11.12.13 pw-id 17 pw-class test789 ! ! p2p NBIP-test789-to-tc4 monitor-session NBIP-test789-to-asd-tc4 neighbor ipv4 10.11.12.13 pw-id 50 pw-class test789 ! ! ! mpls ldp router-id 10.14.15.16 discovery targeted-hello accept nsr graceful-restart explicit-null igp sync delay 10 log neighbor graceful-restart session-protection nsr ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 discovery hello holdtime 15 discovery hello interval 5 ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2468 discovery hello holdtime 15 discovery hello interval 5 ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2357 discovery hello holdtime 15 discovery hello interval 5 ! interface TenGigE0/1/0/0 discovery hello holdtime 15 discovery hello interval 5 ! ! multicast-routing address-family ipv4 interface Loopback0 enable ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 enable ! interface TenGigE0/1/0/0 enable ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2468 enable ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2357 enable ! nsf multipath ssm range mVPN-SSM-core-range rate-per-route interface all enable accounting per-prefix ! ! router igmp interface Loopback0 static-group 224.1.3.0 inc-mask 0.0.0.1 count 256 static-group 224.1.4.0 inc-mask 0.0.0.1 count 256 static-group 233.81.233.0 inc-mask 0.0.0.1 count 256 ! ssh server v2 ssh server vrf default ssh server logging ssh server session-limit 10 mpls ip-ttl-propagate disable router pim address-family ipv4 rp-address 10.16.17.18 override maximum routes 2000 interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 bfd minimum-interval 50 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 enable ! interface TenGigE0/1/0/0 bfd minimum-interval 50 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 enable ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2468 bfd minimum-interval 15 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 bsr-border enable ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2357 bfd minimum-interval 15 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 bsr-border enable ! ! ! end

interface Bundle-Ether1 description *** To test456 *** mtu 9000 mac-address e.0.1 load-interval 30 dampening interface Bundle-Ether1.100 description *** test456 *** mtu 1518 service-policy input critical-data-marker ipv4 address 10.10.50.60 255.255.254.0 ipv4 verify unicast source reachable-via rx arp timeout 3600 ipv4 unreachables disable encapsulation dot1q 100 ipv4 access-group filter-managment-cpe-ingress ingress ipv4 access-group filter-managment-cpe-egress egress

interface Bundle-Ether1.100 description *** test456 *** mtu 1518 service-policy input critical-data-marker ipv4 address 10.10.50.60 255.255.254.0 ipv4 verify unicast source reachable-via rx arp timeout 3600 ipv4 unreachables disable encapsulation dot1q 100 ipv4 access-group filter-managment-cpe-ingress ingress ipv4 access-group filter-managment-cpe-egress egress
interface Loopback0 description *** Router-id for routing processes *** ipv4 address 10.0.0.1 255.255.255.255
interface Loopback1 description *** Management loopback *** ipv4 address 10.1.2.3 255.255.255.255

interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 description *** To router2 (Te 0/1/0/3) *** mtu 9000 service-policy output egress-core ipv4 address 10.12.3.4 255.255.255.252 carrier-delay up 5000 down 0 load-interval 30 dampening
interface TenGigE0/0/0/1 description *** To router3 (Te 1/7) *** mtu 9000 carrier-delay up 5000 down 0 mac-address e.0.8 load-interval 30 dampening

interface BVI200 description *** Wisper Internet aggregatie interface *** ipv4 address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.128 ipv4 verify unicast source reachable-via rx arp timeout 3600 local-proxy-arp ipv4 unreachables disable mac-address e.0.1 load-interval 30
interface BVI611 description *** TEST *** ipv4 address 10.2.3.4 255.255.255.0 ipv4 verify unicast source reachable-via rx arp timeout 3600 ipv4 unreachables disable mac-address e.0.8

router isis test is-type level-1 net 47.0012.0000.0000.1111.00 nsf ietf log adjacency changes lsp-gen-interval maximum-wait 5000 initial-wait 1 secondary-wait 50 level 1 address-family ipv4 unicast metric-style wide ispf level 1 spf-interval maximum-wait 1000 initial-wait 1 secondary-wait 50 interface Bundle-Ether1.111 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! interface Bundle-Ether1.611 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! interface Bundle-Ether2.211 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! interface Bundle-Ether2.611 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! interface Loopback0 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 circuit-type level-1 bfd minimum-interval 50 bfd multiplier 3 bfd fast-detect ipv4 point-to-point address-family ipv4 unicast metric 10 mpls ldp sync interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.100 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.110 passive address-family ipv4 unicast ! interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.611 passive address-family ipv4 unicast !

router bgp 65164 nsr bgp router-id 10.12.34.56 bgp graceful-restart graceful-reset bgp graceful-restart bgp log neighbor changes detail bgp bestpath med always bgp fast-external-fallover disable address-family ipv4 unicast redistribute connected address-family vpnv4 unicast ! address-family ipv6 unicast redistribute connected allocate-label all address-family ipv4 mdt ! neighbor 10.12.34.57 remote-as 65164 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 bfd minimum-interval 50 update-source Loopback0 graceful-restart address-family ipv4 unicast maximum-prefix 700000 90 address-family vpnv4 unicast ! address-family ipv6 labeled-unicast maximum-prefix 100000 75 address-family ipv4 mdt ! neighbor 10.12.34.58 remote-as 50266 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 bfd minimum-interval 50 update-source Loopback0 graceful-restart address-family ipv4 unicast maximum-prefix 700000 90 address-family vpnv4 unicast ! address-family ipv6 labeled-unicast maximum-prefix 100000 75 address-family ipv4 mdt !
router igmp interface Loopback0 static-group 224.1.3.0 inc-mask 0.0.0.1 count 256 static-group 224.1.4.0 inc-mask 0.0.0.1 count 256 static-group 233.81.233.0 inc-mask 0.0.0.1 count 256

router pim address-family ipv4 rp-address 10.16.17.18 override maximum routes 2000 interface TenGigE0/0/0/0 bfd minimum-interval 50 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 enable interface TenGigE0/1/0/0 bfd minimum-interval 50 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 enable interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2468 bfd minimum-interval 15 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 bsr-border enable interface TenGigE0/0/0/1.2357 bfd minimum-interval 15 bfd fast-detect bfd multiplier 3 bsr-border enable
class-map match-any test123 match dscp ipv4 af41 end-class-map
